input: Country: Spain. Purchaser Name: BOARD OF GOVERNORS OF VALENCIA CITY COUNCIL. Summary: Supply and Installation of "Self-Sufficient Lighting in the Perellonet District (Divided into Four Lots). Description: The purpose of this contract is to carry out the work to acquire, install and put into service the necessary equipment to ensure that the lighting and municipal public services of Perellonet are energy self-sufficient.<br> This requires, on the one hand, the transformation from the installation of obsolete lighting to a more efficient one, with better performance and lower consumption, and on the other hand, acquire and install the necessary equipment to generate sufficient energy of renewable origin, which will be of the photovoltaic solar type, accumulate it in batteries of capacity sufficient, and inject it at night to compensate for the consumption of all the lighting in the Perellonet district with self-consumption mechanisms for collective compensation.<br> The District of Perellonet is located in District 19 of the city of Valencia.<br> Lot 1 Perellonet North<br> Self-sufficient lighting in the district of Perellonet Norte<br> Lot 2 Perellonet Central<br> Self-sufficient lighting in the district of Perellonet Central<br> Lot 3 Perellonet South<br> Self-sufficient lighting in the Perellonet Sur district<br> Lot 4 Perellonet Photovoltaic<br> Self-sufficient lighting in the district of Perellonet Photovoltaic<br> Doc Title: Supply and installation of "Self-sufficient lighting in the district of Perellonet (divided into four lots)<br> Contract Type: supplies. Tender Value: 501252.82. Currency: EUR. Published Date: 2025-10-28. Closing Date: 2025-11-26. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Purchaser_Name: BOARD OF GOVERNORS OF VALENCIA CITY COUNCIL
output.Summary: Supply and Installation of "Self-Sufficient Lighting in the Perellonet District (Divided into Four Lots)

Your group responds to the functional similarity of los products and the geographical proximity of beneficiary entities, which facilitates efficient and centralized logistics. The objective is to guarantee a homogeneous service to the municipalities of El Pla de l'Estany with a typology and uses of similar machinery.<br> Lot 2 - GPL City Council of why and Vilademuls AJ fuel<br> This lot is configured separately for two main reasons:<br> • The Vilademuls City Council, due to its specific location and operation, autonomously manages the supply for its fleet and equipment.<br> • In addition, the liquefied petroleum gas supply is added (LPG) for the City Council of why, a supply with technical and distribution characteristics of conventional fuels. For this reason, the University of Cantabria proposes an innovative purchase structure combining the SDA procedure with the use of the catalog e.... Tender Value: 12000000. Currency: EUR.
